text.style: text-anchor: middle; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400; font-family: Open-Sans, sans-serif;
text.tspan: GLEIF Out of band - Insecure

text.style: text-anchor: middle; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400; font-family: Open-Sans, sans-serif;
text.tspan: GLEIF Desktop Software - Secure

text.style: text-anchor: middle; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400; font-family: Open-Sans, sans-serif;
text.tspan: QVI Desktop Software - Secure

text.style: text-anchor: middle; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400; font-family: Open-Sans, sans-serif;
text.tspan: QVI Out of band - Insecure

text.style: font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400;
text.tspan: vLEI Issuer Qualification Agreement has been executed by GLEIF

text.style: font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400;
text.tspan: A GLEIF Authorized Representative(GAR) MUST perform identity assurance of a person

text.style: font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400;
text.tspan: serving in the role of QAR.

text.style: font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400;
font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400;
font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400;
font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400;
text.tspan: [identity assurance]

text.style: font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400;
text.tspan: The GAR MUST perform manual verification of the QARâ€™s legal identity for which the GAR has already performed Identity Assurance.

text.style: font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400;
font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400;
font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400;
font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400;
text.tspan: [manual verififcation]

text.style: font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400;
text.tspan: The QAR and GAR MUST use an OOBI protocol (such as a QR code) to share the GLEIF KERI DID with the QAR.

text.style: font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400;
font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400;
font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400;
font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400;
text.tspan: The GAR MUST send a Challenge Message to the QVI KERI DID as defined in the Technical Requirements Part 1 for the purposes of cryptographic authentication of the QVI KERI DID.

text.style: font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400;
font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400;

svg.text: Copy challenge to video conference chat

text.style: font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400;
font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400;
font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400;
font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400;
text.tspan: The QAR MUST use its Private Key Store to sign

text.style: font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400;
text.tspan: and return a Challenge Response Message,

text.style: font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400;
text.tspan: after which the QAR must acknowledge

text.style: font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400;
text.tspan: that this action has been completed.

text.style: font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400;

svg.text: Create signed challenge response containing challenge message

text.style: font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400;
font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400;
font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400;
font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; font-weight: 400;
text.tspan: [Verify challenge response and signature]

text.style: font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400;
text.tspan: The GAR approves the issuance of the QVI vLEI Credential and the QVI receives the credential in its credential wallet.

text.style: font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400;
text.tspan: Retention/records management of documentation

text.style: font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400;
text.tspan: submitted with issuance request

text.style: font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400;
text.tspan: GLEIF adds the LEI of the QVI to the process

text.style: font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400;
text.tspan: to monitor that the status of LEIs used within vLEIs

text.style: font-family: "trebuchet ms", verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400;
text.tspan: (requirement to remain Issued and Active within the GLEIS)

text.style: text-anchor: middle; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400; font-family: Open-Sans, sans-serif;
text.tspan: GLEIF Out of band - Insecure

text.style: text-anchor: middle; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400; font-family: Open-Sans, sans-serif;
text.tspan: GLEIF Desktop Software - Secure

text.style: text-anchor: middle; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400; font-family: Open-Sans, sans-serif;
text.tspan: QVI Desktop Software - Secure

text.style: text-anchor: middle; font-size: 14px; font-weight: 400; font-family: Open-Sans, sans-serif;
text.tspan: QVI Out of band - Insecure
